statement.p:
Consider a {{solid}} that has {{base}} base with {{measuretype}} {{b}} {{unit}}, and height {{height}} {{unit}}. Suppose that at height h {{unit}} the density of this {{solid}} is \delta(h)={{d}}\ \text{kg}/\text{ {{symbol}} }^3 .
Find an integral which computes the mass of this {{solid}}.
Find an expression involving integrals which computes the height of the center of mass for this {{solid}}.
